Dependency

None

Examples

Result : {{selectedItem | json}}

Code

HTML
	
<p><select ng-model="selectedItem" ng-options="item.id as item.name for item in items"></select></p>
<p>Result : {{selectedItem | json}}</p>
JavaScript
	
angular.module('angularShowcaseApp')
  .controller('OnemenuCtrl', function ($scope) {
    $scope.items = [
     { id: 1, name: 'foo' },
     { id: 2, name: 'bar' },
     { id: 3, name: 'blah' }
   ];
  });
